title: SOLD- T206 Cobb PSA for sale
author: tolstoi

posts.post_title: SOLD- T206 Cobb PSA for sale
posts.post_content:
I hate to give this up, but here is a very nice looking Cobb bat on shoulder, graded by PSA as authentic.  The card looks full-size, would probably grade vg-vgex otherwise.  Great colors and a clean back.  

Cobb bat on shoulder Piedmont 350 Subj. fact.25 PSA Authentic $424 dlvd SOLD

I have included pics below:
[IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc434/tolstoi1/DSC00397.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc434/tolstoi1/DSC00398.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc434/tolstoi1/DSC00399.jpg[/IMG]  Straight up and down
[IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc434/tolstoi1/DSC00400.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc434/tolstoi1/DSC00401.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc434/tolstoi1/DSC00402.jpg[/IMG]

Prefer paypal gift or payment owed or just so that there are no fees on my end.  First email that says they'll take it will get it (rdamboise4@gmail.com).

Hi, maybe I'm missing something here but do you know what the alterationon the card is?  Thanks,

Andy

I think usually when an item is trimmed, the holder says so but when the holder says altered doesn't that mean it can be either trimmed or have some kind of restoration done?

Not sure what was done to the card, you can't really notice anything weird with it and it looks pretty nice.

posts.post_title: straight up & down pic would help
posts.post_content: it looks like it could be angle cut at the bottom or slightly trimmed on right side.
